TI_DOC.P: EIB - Gushi Biomass Project - Power Plant Civil Works (CN-Zhengzhou)

STI_DOC.P: This is a re-publication of Procurement Notice 2017/S 065-121755 originally published in OJ/S 065 of 1.4.2017.

CONTENTS.P: Project: EIB financed Gushi County Biomass Project
Scope of Bid: Power Plant Civil Works
Purchaser: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd (hereinafter called “the Borrower”) has received a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) (hereinafter called “the Bank”), towards the cost of the Gushi Biomass Project (No 2013 — 0464) (hereinafter called “the Project”). This International Invitation for Tenders relates to the contract for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 1, Power Plant Civil Works.

This contract will include (but not limited to): Construction of steam turbine generator room, main control room, first station for heating, stand-by gas boiler room, fuel storage shed, material feeding office, chemical water treatment room, comprehensive pump room, maintenance shop, comprehensive office building, waiting building for work, material warehouse, cooling tower, chimney, desulfurisation tower foundation, pool for desulfurisation and denitration, foundation of suction fun and blower, dust catcher foundation, foundation of boiler and boiler auxiliaries, foundation of steam turbine generator and foundation of steam turbine generator auxiliaries, water treatment equipment foundation, material feeding system, power distribution system, neutralising water tank, reservoir, emergency oil pond, fire tank, road and square within the plant, plant area greening, channel and tunnel within the plant, outdoor water supply and drainage within the plant, heating net pipe within the plant.
This contract is expected to be implemented from 1 May 2018 to 30 April 2019 (12months).
The bid evaluation criteria shall be as following, in decreasing order of importance：
Under the condition that the bidder is qualified for the requirements specified in the bidding documents, the lowest evaluated bid shall be accepted.

1) Qualification requirements: At least three (3) similar project from the year of 2013 as contractor, subcontractor, and or management contractor (with each contract price no less than nine (9) million RMB) for industry project-civil works;

2) Financial capability: The audited financial statements for the last three (3) years (including the auditor’s reports, the balance sheets, the profit & loss sheets and the cash flow sheets) and must demonstrate the current soundness of the bidder’s financial position and indicate its prospective long-term profitability. The bidder’s average annual construction turnover should be no less than RMB 80 million (or equivalent in foreign currency) with profit each of these 3 years;

3) Experience of main personnel: The project manager, chief engineer, structure engineer, site manager, and quality manager of the bidder for this project should have at least (10) years experience in similar works.
All firms from Eligible Sources Countries as defined in the Procurement Guidelines of the Bank and also qualified for the above-mentioned requirements, are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
Office: Department 7 of Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address: B-9, Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou,
P.R. China
Contact person: Ms. Ding Jiangrui
e-mail: guojizhaobiao7@126.com
Time: 8:30-12:00 and 13:00-15:30 (Beijing Time), from 27 January 2018 to 19 March 2018.

A complete set of bidding documents may be purchased on the submission of an application to the above address, and upon payment of a non-refundable fee of RMB 2,100 (in word: two thousand and one hundred RMB) or EUR 300 (in word: three hundred EUR) to the following bank account, bearing the name of the project.
On request, against a faxed copy of the evidence of the remittance, the bidding documents may be sent by courier service to the bidder.
Bank Account Information:
Name: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
RMB Bank Account: China Construction Bank (CCB) Zhengzhou Branch
EUR Bank Account: China CITIC Bank Zhengzhou Branch (Zhengzhou, China)

A bid security of RMB 1,500,000 (in word: one million and five hundred thousand RMB) or EUR 215,000 (in word: two hundred and fifteen thousand EUR) fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered, airmail or courier for overseas delivery and surface mail or courier for local delivery but not by electronic, in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 1, Power Plant Civil Works” not later than 10 a.m. Beijing Time on 19 March 2018 at the following address:
Agency and Address for delivery of Bids:
Bidding Agency: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address: No.1 Conference Room, B-11 Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road,
Jinshui District, Zhengzhou, P.R. China
Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of bidders’ representatives who choose to attend at 10 a.m. 19 March 2018.

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

STI_DOC.P: This is a re-publication of Procurement Notice 2017/S 065-121755 originally published in OJ/S 065 of 1.4.2017.

CONTENTS.P: Project: EIB financed Gushi County Biomass Project
Scope of Bid: Power Plant Civil Works
Purchaser: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd (hereinafter called “the Borrower”) has received a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) (hereinafter called “the Bank”), towards the cost of the Gushi Biomass Project (No 2013 — 0464) (hereinafter called “the Project”). This International Invitation for Tenders relates to the contract for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 1, Power Plant Civil Works.

This contract will include (but not limited to): Construction of steam turbine generator room, main control room, first station for heating, stand-by gas boiler room, fuel storage shed, material feeding office, chemical water treatment room, comprehensive pump room, maintenance shop, comprehensive office building, waiting building for work, material warehouse, cooling tower, chimney, desulfurisation tower foundation, pool for desulfurisation and denitration, foundation of suction fun and blower, dust catcher foundation, foundation of boiler and boiler auxiliaries, foundation of steam turbine generator and foundation of steam turbine generator auxiliaries, water treatment equipment foundation, material feeding system, power distribution system, neutralising water tank, reservoir, emergency oil pond, fire tank, road and square within the plant, plant area greening, channel and tunnel within the plant, outdoor water supply and drainage within the plant, heating net pipe within the plant.
This contract is expected to be implemented from 1 May 2018 to 30 April 2019 (12months).
The bid evaluation criteria shall be as following, in decreasing order of importance：
Under the condition that the bidder is qualified for the requirements specified in the bidding documents, the lowest evaluated bid shall be accepted.

1) Qualification requirements: At least three (3) similar project from the year of 2013 as contractor, subcontractor, and or management contractor (with each contract price no less than nine (9) million RMB) for industry project-civil works;

2) Financial capability: The audited financial statements for the last three (3) years (including the auditor’s reports, the balance sheets, the profit & loss sheets and the cash flow sheets) and must demonstrate the current soundness of the bidder’s financial position and indicate its prospective long-term profitability. The bidder’s average annual construction turnover should be no less than RMB 80 million (or equivalent in foreign currency) with profit each of these 3 years;

3) Experience of main personnel: The project manager, chief engineer, structure engineer, site manager, and quality manager of the bidder for this project should have at least (10) years experience in similar works.
All firms from Eligible Sources Countries as defined in the Procurement Guidelines of the Bank and also qualified for the above-mentioned requirements, are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Gushi Biomass Project - Power Plant Civil Works (CN-Zhengzhou)

STI_DOC.P: This is a re-publication of Procurement Notice 2017/S 065-121755 originally published in OJ/S 065 of 1.4.2017.

CONTENTS.P: Project: EIB financed Gushi County Biomass Project
Scope of Bid: Power Plant Civil Works
Purchaser: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd (hereinafter called “the Borrower”) has received a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) (hereinafter called “the Bank”), towards the cost of the Gushi Biomass Project (No 2013 — 0464) (hereinafter called “the Project”). This International Invitation for Tenders relates to the contract for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 1, Power Plant Civil Works.

This contract will include (but not limited to): Construction of steam turbine generator room, main control room, first station for heating, stand-by gas boiler room, fuel storage shed, material feeding office, chemical water treatment room, comprehensive pump room, maintenance shop, comprehensive office building, waiting building for work, material warehouse, cooling tower, chimney, desulfurisation tower foundation, pool for desulfurisation and denitration, foundation of suction fun and blower, dust catcher foundation, foundation of boiler and boiler auxiliaries, foundation of steam turbine generator and foundation of steam turbine generator auxiliaries, water treatment equipment foundation, material feeding system, power distribution system, neutralising water tank, reservoir, emergency oil pond, fire tank, road and square within the plant, plant area greening, channel and tunnel within the plant, outdoor water supply and drainage within the plant, heating net pipe within the plant.
This contract is expected to be implemented from 1 May 2018 to 30 April 2019 (12months).
The bid evaluation criteria shall be as following, in decreasing order of importance：
Under the condition that the bidder is qualified for the requirements specified in the bidding documents, the lowest evaluated bid shall be accepted.

1) Qualification requirements: At least three (3) similar project from the year of 2013 as contractor, subcontractor, and or management contractor (with each contract price no less than nine (9) million RMB) for industry project-civil works;

2) Financial capability: The audited financial statements for the last three (3) years (including the auditor’s reports, the balance sheets, the profit & loss sheets and the cash flow sheets) and must demonstrate the current soundness of the bidder’s financial position and indicate its prospective long-term profitability. The bidder’s average annual construction turnover should be no less than RMB 80 million (or equivalent in foreign currency) with profit each of these 3 years;

3) Experience of main personnel: The project manager, chief engineer, structure engineer, site manager, and quality manager of the bidder for this project should have at least (10) years experience in similar works.
All firms from Eligible Sources Countries as defined in the Procurement Guidelines of the Bank and also qualified for the above-mentioned requirements, are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
Office: Department 7 of Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address: B-9, Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou,
P.R. China
Contact person: Ms. Ding Jiangrui
e-mail: guojizhaobiao7@126.com
Time: 8:30-12:00 and 13:00-15:30 (Beijing Time), from 27 January 2018 to 19 March 2018.

A complete set of bidding documents may be purchased on the submission of an application to the above address, and upon payment of a non-refundable fee of RMB 2,100 (in word: two thousand and one hundred RMB) or EUR 300 (in word: three hundred EUR) to the following bank account, bearing the name of the project.
On request, against a faxed copy of the evidence of the remittance, the bidding documents may be sent by courier service to the bidder.
Bank Account Information:
Name: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
RMB Bank Account: China Construction Bank (CCB) Zhengzhou Branch
EUR Bank Account: China CITIC Bank Zhengzhou Branch (Zhengzhou, China)

A bid security of RMB 1,500,000 (in word: one million and five hundred thousand RMB) or EUR 215,000 (in word: two hundred and fifteen thousand EUR) fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered, airmail or courier for overseas delivery and surface mail or courier for local delivery but not by electronic, in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 1, Power Plant Civil Works” not later than 10 a.m. Beijing Time on 19 March 2018 at the following address:
Agency and Address for delivery of Bids:
Bidding Agency: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address: No.1 Conference Room, B-11 Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road,
Jinshui District, Zhengzhou, P.R. China
Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of bidders’ representatives who choose to attend at 10 a.m. 19 March 2018.
